# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.isWinningBid() method

Check if a bid is or will be a winning bid

## Example

```javascript
const auctionId = 0;
const bidAmount = 100;
const isWinningBid = await contract.englishAuctions.isWinningBid(
  auctionId,
  bidAmount,
);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
isWinningBid(auctionId: BigNumberish, bidAmount: BigNumberish): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description   |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | Auction Id    |
| bidAmount | BigNumberish | Amount to bid |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

true if the bid is or will be a winning bid
